task.summary: Cleanup of scroll - playing with plugin Ideas
allow notify styles to be overridden
Start of re-write with Browserify + Gulp
Add different build process for CI
Added more coverage for notify & scroll
Fixed internal bug with scroll + tests
First pass at adding Form sync (no need for IDs - yay)
added specs for form inputs & textareas
Use common options for both karma configs
Build to both minified & normal output, added spec for middleware
Added sync for form Radios, checkboxes & selects
Add force change event for IE on radio & checkboxes
Allow file contents to be returned instead of middleware
Ensure events are not added twice
